001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticUtility;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
007
008import java.util.Arrays;
009import java.util.HashMap;
010import java.util.Map;
011import java.util.Set;
012
013@StaticUtility
014public final class Regularizations {
015
016    private Regularizations() {
017    }
018
019    public static <N extends Number> Vector<N> applyExplicitRegularization(Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations, Vector<N> thetas, Vector<N> gradients) {
020        if (regularizations.isEmpty()) {
021            return gradients;
022        }
023        N[] values = Arrays.copyOf(gradients.asArray(), gradients.getDimensions());
024        for (ExplicitRegularization<N> regularization : regularizations) {
025            for (int i = 0; i < thetas.getDimensions(); i++) {
026                N adjustment = regularization.gradientAdjustment(thetas.get(i + 1));
027                values[i] = regularization.getCurrentNumberType().add(values[i], adjustment);
028            }
029        }
030        return new TypedVector<>(values, gradients.isColumnVector(), gradients.getCurrentNumberType());
031    }
032
033    private static final Map<JavaNumberTypeSupport<?>, RegularizationFactory<?>> factories = new HashMap<>();
034
035    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
036    public static <N extends Number> RegularizationFactory<N> getFactory(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
037        if (!factories.containsKey(typeSupport)) {
038            synchronized (factories) {
039                if (!factories.containsKey(typeSupport)) {
040                    factories.put(typeSupport, new RegularizationFactory<>(typeSupport));
041                }
042            }
043        }
044        return (RegularizationFactory<N>) factories.get(typeSupport);
045    }
046}
